title: Interregional Gymnastic Vice-Champion
description: In 2015, I managed to get the second place in the interregional gymnastic championships, I would like to give a shutout to my rival, Alex Duriez, who was later crowned world champion.

title: Best French PowerPoint Content Creator
description: In 2021, I launched an account about PowerPoint. One year later, I was the number 1 French content creator on this topic. I considered myself to be in the top 50 Europeans PowerPoint makers.

title: 4 languages mastered
description: In 2023, I achieved proficiency in four languages: French, English, Spanish, and German. I learned English and German at school, and Spanish through a long 3-month exchange I did when I was 9.

title: Top 3 EPFL Students
description: On my first year at EPFL, I managed to get a 5.91/6 GPA, ranking me in the top 3 students of my cohort (702 students). This achievement reflects my dedication and hard work in my studies.

title: Win the Blockchain Hackathon
description: In 2025, I participated to the Blockchain Hackathon at EPFL, and my team won first place. Thanks to this experience, I met the CTO of BoundaryAI, who later offered me a position as Lead Backend Developer.
